bibl.title: A Ptolemaic Terracotta Head in the Petrie Museum.
bibl.note: London, Petrie Museum of Egyptian Archaeology at University College, Inv. UC 49909. H. 5 cm. Memphis (?), Ptolemaic period. The abnormalities of the figure possibly show characteristics of a disease (elephantiasis?).
bibl.seg: BOOTH Charlotte, A Ptolemaic Terracotta Head in the Petrie Museum.

London, Petrie Museum of Egyptian Archaeology at University College, Inv. UC 49909. H. 5 cm. Memphis (?), Ptolemaic period. The abnormalities of the figure possibly show characteristics of a disease (elephantiasis?).
